title: AU Small Finance Bank ties up with Niva Bupa to offer health insurance products
description: AU Small Finance Bank has partnered with Niva Bupa Health Insurance Company to offer health insurance products to its over one crore customers. This collaboration aims to enhance the distribution reach of Niva Bupa and provide comprehensive health insurance solutions to AU SFB's customer base, according to a regulatory filing.
